interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Royal Locks Curl Rescue Leave in Conditioner | Curly Hair Therapy | Keravis Ultra Conditioning Formula | 4 Oz Review Date: 2018/12/06 Store: Royal Locks Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Royal Locks', 'Material Feature': 'Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Frizzy, Curly, Thick, Damaged', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '4 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 3 x 5 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '651536096977'} Review Text: This is the real deal. Designed for naturally curly, wavy or grey hair, or any hair type that needs deep conditioning. I have 50 year old curly highlighted Irish hair. My styist actually noticed how soft it felt and controllable it looked. The product calls it Curl Rescue with Keravis Ultra Conditioning Formula for Curls. No Sulfate or paraben; alcohol & cruelty free. With keratin and Vitamin B5.

It is doubled packaged inside a mylar container to control any spill in transit. Review Title: Leave in Conditioner for Curly Hair Therapy by Royal Locks Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Summary:**

This user showcases a strong preference for high-quality products that prioritize effectiveness and meet specific grooming needs. They demonstrate loyalty to brands that provide innovative solutions, as exemplified by their long-term use of a particular electric toothbrush. Their focus on oral care extends to their appreciation for features like deep cleaning capability, gentle treatment of gums and teeth, and customizable options, highlighting a commitment to comprehensive dental hygiene.

Recently, the user expressed a keen interest in hair care, specifically seeking products that cater to curly hair needs. They emphasize the importance of deep conditioning, natural ingredients, and formulations free from harsh chemicals. Their positive experience with a leave-in conditioner reflects a desire for effective hair management, seeking results that enhance hair softness and control.

The user values longevity and sustainable performance in their grooming products, as noted in both their dental and hair care routines. They likely appreciate ongoing recommendations in the realm of personal care, with a particular interest in items that align with high standards of quality and user-friendliness. Their consistent five-star ratings across different product categories indicate a discerning taste, alongside a preference for products that facilitate easy maintenance and use.
